item.title: Testing Deployment
item.description: This document will serve as a test for automatic deployment purposes. Initial attempt - can I deploy changes through GIT

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello, world! I figured it was time to do something with the jayke.nl domain that I’ve had for a long time play around with some static site generation tooling and create a place where I can jot down some of my thoughts, or indulge in shameless self-promotion over some of the hobby projects I have done. Let’s see what comes of this. I’ll figure out over time whether I have anything relevant to share.
